quest.name: Vic┨οry  ̈ ̈ ̈╳, │̆││ε Lost
journal: G'raha Tia regards his comrades in solemn silence.
objectives: Pass through the portal and wait for your comrades at the designated location.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Never have I felt such emptiness. It's as if a part of me is gone...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...I'm fine, Forename.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Like I said, our quest doesn't end here.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Are you all ready to continue on?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Then let us make for where that light shone. Y'shtola and Urianger have opened the way for us.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Some manner of Ea device. If our friends awakened it, then it should be safe to use.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Judging by the direction, this should be the place.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Yes, I can feel it! The aether emanating from the arcane pattern!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This is a portal, and no mistake. Let us see where it leads.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: What manner of place awaits us, I wonder...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Travel through the portal?

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: <whirr> Intruder alert.

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Eliminate. Eliminate.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Amazing... Yet another civilization...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Attacked as soon as you arrived!? Not the most welcoming of places, is it...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: We must try to find denizens who are amenable to conversation.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We should also get the lay of the land, see how far we can go.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'll help Alphinaud with that. In the meantime, you and G'raha can search for friendlier folk.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Apart from hostile beings, take care with your footing. I mislike the look of this terrain.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Not knowing what the locals are like, you'd best take care yourselves. We'll find you once we've finished exploring.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I expect the twins will seek the outermost bounds of the isle, so I propose we search the central area.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: There are machines patrolling here and there. Sentinels, in all likelihood.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Like those you encountered, they will most certainly attack any who venture too close.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: So let us avoid them, and look for others that appear more approachable.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You see naught but patrolling machines in the area. They do not seem inclined to nonviolent intercourse.

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You are under attack!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: <blip> <bloop>

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Hello, hello. Hello, hello.

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Shutting down... Bzzzt...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Hell...o... Hell...o.

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: Bzzzt... Additional entity detected.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Look, Forename. The machines here do not appear hostile. Let's see if we can communicate with them...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Begging your pardon, but we are searching for the denizens of this star.

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: Bzzzt... Unknown life-forms detected. Assigning generic label: interplanetary travelers.

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: Greetings and welcome to the planet. <blip> <bloooooop>

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: The planet...what? Could you please repeat that?

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: It appears your hearing organ is unable to process the name in our tongue. It may be translated into yours as “Alphatron.”

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: Our people, meanwhile, are called the Omicrons, and you stand within one of our outposts.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: The Omicrons, you say... And what is it that you do here?

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: We are preparing for war.

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: As we presently do not have a designated target, you have nothing to fear.

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: Should your star become designated, however, you will be taken into custody and or terminated.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Not a little frightening, these Omicrons, but at least they seem to be forthright...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I will see what else I can learn from this fellow, if you could try speaking with the others?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Go on and try speaking with the other units here. With our combined findings, perhaps we can piece together the state of affairs for the Omicrons.

dialogue.name: M032
dialogue.text: The rules of engagement forbid the harming of neutral travelers. As long as you abide by our laws, you need not fear for your lives.

dialogue.name: N0055
dialogue.text: <blip> <bloop> Autonomous weapon deployment: complete. Vanguard armament upgrade: complete. Munition levels: satisfactory.

dialogue.name: N0055
dialogue.text: Combat readiness assessment: nominal. Awaiting instructions from Sir.

dialogue.name: N0055
dialogue.text: Maintaining state of combat readiness.

dialogue.name: N0055
dialogue.text: Awaiting instructions from Sir. Please specify target... Please specify target...

dialogue.name: M097
dialogue.text: Bzzzt... Greetings, traveler. When venturing outside the outpost, beware malfunctioning units.

dialogue.name: M097
dialogue.text: They do not heed Sir's commands, and indiscriminately attack all non-Omicrons.

dialogue.name: M097
dialogue.text: For the avoidance of confusion, be advised that “Sir” is the alias of Stigma-1. Sir issues instructions to our forces as the foremost of the six strategic matrices that bear the designation Stigma.

dialogue.name: M097
dialogue.text: For the further avoidance of confusion, be advised that Sir is composed of multiple distinct-but-interconnected units, each of which performs a specific function.

dialogue.name: N0253
dialogue.text:
Bzzzt... Measuring combat capability...
Result: negligible. Subject falls outside targeting parameters.

dialogue.name: N0253
dialogue.text: Greetings, traveler. We are the Omicrons, and our objective is self-enhancement.

dialogue.name: N0253
dialogue.text: In order to achieve this, we venture forth in conquest to acquire combat data and resources.

dialogue.name: N0253
dialogue.text: Most recently, we succeeded in subjugating the home world of the beings whose strength was said to be without parallel: the dragons.

dialogue.name: N0253
dialogue.text: Yet though the endeavor yielded a wealth of combat data, the star was rendered barren and unable to yield resources. A subsequent costing determined that the losses incurred exceeded the gains.

dialogue.name: N0253
dialogue.text: Since conquering the dragons, no new instructions have come from Sir, but we stand ready for deployment.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: You learned a few things? So did I. Ere we share our findings, however, I believe it best to step outside the outpost. Come with me.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We've finished surveying the area. This will come as no surprise, but there was no way forward.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There were portals like the one we used to get here, but those that worked only sent us to isolated isles.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Then as before, we must locate the embodiment of the emotion that bars the way.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What of yourselves? Did you find anyone to speak with?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So the Omicrons seek to advance themselves through conquest...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Following their victory over the dragons, they stand ready for the next campaign, but their leader has yet to issue new commands. And so they wait.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: In such a place, who could it be that fits Urianger's description? A soul whose yearning for oblivion surpasses all others...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Urianger said this?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: During our investigation, before we joined you in Elegeia.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So that's the way of it... Why couldn't he just say it to all of us?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Given what we know of this place, it's certainly a curious state of affairs.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: While the dragons and the Ea longed for death, the Omicrons long for conflict. As much as that may lead to destruction, it must be considered a distinct desire.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: In order to find the source of the dominant emotion, I believe we should seek out their leader. This “Sir.”

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: According to M-032─the first Omicron with whom we spoke─there is a console by which we might communicate with it.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: M-032 also added that it would be a “pointless exercise,” but that in itself, I believe, is worth investigating. What say you?
